recipesJson.name: Silk Road
recipesJson.author: COB
recipesJson.description: Yeah, I go chocolate/Cinnamon/tobacco quite frequently. It's a combo that works tho so why not. Am4a is good by itself, as is red Burley, but together there's just that extra layer of complexity. And DNB just to bring it all back to a pipe tobacco more than a dessert tobacco.
